trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKMB118_03319_SEQ_00<tab>Seto would make a personal request of you.

TEXT_LUCKMB118_03319_THANCRED_000_000<tab>Urianger tells me you've been busy trying to win Seto over, and I agree that you're the best <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> for the job. A silver tongue can only get one so far.
TEXT_LUCKMB118_03319_RYNE_000_005<tab>I heard a fearsome roar... Is everything all right?
TEXT_LUCKMB118_03319_URIANGER_000_010<tab>Whatever Seto hath in store for thee, I wish thee godsspeed.
TEXT_LUCKMB118_03319_SETO_000_020<tab>This is not a test of your strength, but a personal request. Please hear my tale.

TEXT_LUCKMB118_03319_SETO_000_021<tab>A while ago, I fought sin eaters who had wandered into Il Mheg. In the heat of battle, I dropped a prized possession─a medallion. Of all the places that it should fall, it was Longmirror Lake.

TEXT_LUCKMB118_03319_SETO_000_022<tab>We amaro are not fond of water─we certainly cannot dive very deep. I briefly entertained the thought of turning to the Fuath, but they are more likely to keep my medallion out of mischief than return it to me.
TEXT_LUCKMB118_03319_SETO_000_023<tab>I had despaired of retrieving my treasure, but having seen what you are capable of, perhaps you will be able to find it.
TEXT_LUCKMB118_03319_SETO_000_024<tab>While I ponder your request for the shoes, will you not go and search for my medallion? If it should elude even you, I will accept that it is gone forever.
TEXT_LUCKMB118_03319_SETO_000_030<tab>As I recall, I was above the waters west of the castle when I dropped the medallion. I wish you luck.
TEXT_LUCKMB118_03319_SYSTEM_000_040<tab>This does not appear to be Seto's medallion.
